document_data.name: Rondras Stormserpent
document_data.mainbody: '''Rondras Stormserpent''' was a heir of House [[Stormserpent]] in the early mid-15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He and [[Marlin Stormserpent]] hated each other a lot. He was a heir of House [[Stormserpent]].
document_data.History:
Rondras Stormserpent was one of the four Stormserpent heirs in the 1430s [[DR]]. When [[Nethglas Stormserpent]] stole the ''[[Wyverntongue Chalice]]'', he told his siblings, before deciding he'd prefer no one knew it and swearing them to secrecy on pain of death. After Nethglas killed his brother [[Elgrym Stormserpent]] for sharing this information with [[Nael Rowanmantle]], only two of his siblings were left alive knowing of the prank.

When in {{yearlink|1437}}, [[Emvar Obarskyr]] was slain in the [[Vast Swamp]] close to [[Sembia]], Nethglas Stormserpent was killed with him.{{Cite dragon/365/Backdrop: Cormyr|17}} While his body was being brought to the house, Marlin Stormserpent quietly poisoned Rondras, killing him and becoming the only heir.
